code-table.name: publication-status-codes
code-table.description: This code table stores FRUS publication status types.

item.label: Being Planned (research has not begun)
item.hint: Volume is being planned (research has not begun)

item.label: Being Researched or Prepared
item.hint: Volume is being researched or prepared

item.label: Published
item.hint: Volume has been published online and/or in print
